104446.text:
fix: skip case sensitivity when checking Azure NSG rules
fix: ensure InstanceShutdownByProviderID return false for creating Azure VMs
104446.markdown:
Fix: skip case sensitivity when checking Azure NSG rules
  fix: ensure InstanceShutdownByProviderID return false for creating Azure VMs ([#104446](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104446), [@feiskyer](https://github.com/feiskyer)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
104446.author: feiskyer

104469.text: Fixes a regression that could cause panics in LRU caches in controller-manager, kubelet, kube-apiserver, or client-go EventSourceObjectSpamFilter
104469.markdown: Fixes a regression that could cause panics in LRU caches in controller-manager, kubelet, kube-apiserver, or client-go EventSourceObjectSpamFilter ([#104469](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104469), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery, Auth, CLI, Cloud Provider, Cluster Lifecycle, Instrumentation and Storage]
104469.author: liggitt

104529.text: Fixed occasional pod cgroup freeze when using cgroup v1 and systemd driver.
104529.markdown: Fixed occasional pod cgroup freeze when using cgroup v1 and systemd driver. ([#104529](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104529), [@kolyshkin](https://github.com/kolyshkin)) [SIG Node]
104529.author: kolyshkin

104672.text: When using `kubectl replace` (or the equivalent API call) on a Service, the caller no longer needs to do a read-modify-write cycle to fetch the allocated values for `.spec.clusterIP` and `.spec.ports[].nodePort`.  Instead the API server will automatically carry these forward from the original object when the new object does not specify them.
104672.markdown: When using `kubectl replace` (or the equivalent API call) on a Service, the caller no longer needs to do a read-modify-write cycle to fetch the allocated values for `.spec.clusterIP` and `.spec.ports[].nodePort`.  Instead the API server will automatically carry these forward from the original object when the new object does not specify them. ([#104672](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104672), [@thockin](https://github.com/thockin)) [SIG Network]
104672.author: thockin

104876.text: Fix Job tracking with finalizers for more than 500 pods, ensuring all finalizers are removed before counting the Pod.
104876.markdown: Fix Job tracking with finalizers for more than 500 pods, ensuring all finalizers are removed before counting the Pod. ([#104876](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104876), [@alculquicondor](https://github.com/alculquicondor)) [SIG Apps]
104876.author: alculquicondor

104905.text: Kubernetes is now built with Golang 1.16.8
104905.markdown: Kubernetes is now built with Golang 1.16.8 ([#104905](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104905), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato)) [SIG Cloud Provider, Instrumentation, Release and Testing]
104905.author: cpanato

104988.text: kube-apiserver: Fixes handling of CRD schemas containing literal null values in enums
104988.markdown: Kube-apiserver: Fixes handling of CRD schemas containing literal null values in enums ([#104988](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/104988), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps and Network]
104988.author: liggitt
